data.oai_dc:dc: Fine root dynamics along an elevational gradient in the southern Appalachian mountains.

The seasonal dynamics of fine root length were calculated from a dataset of the length of root segments visible in photographs of roots growing against the windows of mini-rhizotron boxes.The total length of all root segments within each photograph was calculated. The mean and standard error of these totals were calculated.
Coweeta|LTER|fine root dynamics|fine root production|gradient analysis|mini-rhizotron
